entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
